column4: Hi there, is anyone willing to anser a quick question of mine?

Right ok :D, well I have (somewhere) an Ubuntu live disc, and I always thought that this was a live-only disc, ie can't become a permanent installation, but can I install Ubuntu properly onto a hard drive with this CD, rather than having to download the ISO file? (sorry if that's confusing)
yes. it'S a live and a installer CD
it might try to gte an IP via DHCP
